name: Instructor List
query:
select 
    `tabInstructor`.instructor_name as "Instructor Name:Data/Instructor Name",
    `tabInstructor`.date_of_joining as "Date of Joining:Date/Date of Joining",
    `tabInstructor`.department as "Department:Link/Department",
    `tabInstructor`.gender as "Gender:Link/Gender",
    `tabInstructor`.email as "Email:Data/Email",
    `tabInstructor`.contact_number as "Contact Number:Data/Contact Number",
    count(department) as "Total Employees"
from `tabInstructor`
Group by department;
